data.name: FREAKOUT
data.detailed_description:
Freakout is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. Visit your school and find all your seized items and don't get caught by the possessed principal and his pet dog. Run, Scream, hide. Just don't get caught.



  • 1-4 player online co-op
    Make use of our in-game positional voice chat. Bring friends, or find other players using the server browser.
  • Single player
    Take your shot at visiting your school alone and find items by yourself!
  • Proximity Voice Chat
    Nothing better than hearing your "friends" scream in the distance
  • Investigate
    Use your skills to find clues and collect items to investigate what happened in your school.
  • Flashlight and Flashbang
    You will use an advanced flashlight to defuse the possessed principal and his dog. In order to use flashbang, you have to be sure that your flashlight has enough energy.
  • Enraged Monster
    If you successfully released all the goats that are about to get sacrificed then the monstrous principal gets enraged. During this phase, he will be able to kill survivors.
  • Play as a goat
    If you die as a survivor, you’ll reappear as a goat but you’ll still be able to help your friends escape by doing things such as; finding items for other players to use or distracting the monster.
  • Challenging gameplay
    Every match you’ll play is going to be different. Your perks, escape points, roles and the item placement will all be randomized. You will always feel uneasy because there’s no way to predict how the game will go.

Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: Freakout is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. Visit your school and find all your seized items and don't get caught by the possessed principal and his pet dog and stop the principal from sacrificing his goats. Run, Scream, hide. Just don't get caught.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
